participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

meeq_section_q01.Description: Marijuana makes it harder to think and do things (harder to concentrate or understand; slows people down when they move; harder to remember things). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_mj_l   == '1' ||   tlfb_mj_c_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_mj_synth_l   == '1' ||   tlfb_mj_synth_c_l   == '1'

meeq_section_q02.Description: Marijuana helps a person relax and feel less tense (helps a person unwind and feel calm). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_mj_l   == '1' ||   tlfb_mj_c_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_mj_synth_l   == '1' ||   tlfb_mj_synth_c_l   == '1'

meeq_section_q03.Description: Marijuana helps people get along better with others (talk more; feel more romantic). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_mj_l   == '1' ||   tlfb_mj_c_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_mj_synth_l   == '1' ||   tlfb_mj_synth_c_l   == '1'

meeq_section_q04.Description: Marijuana makes people feel more creative and perceive things differently (music sounds different; things seem more interesting). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_mj_l   == '1' ||   tlfb_mj_c_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_mj_synth_l   == '1' ||   tlfb_mj_synth_c_l   == '1'

meeq_section_q05.Description: Marijuana generally has bad effects on a person (people become angry or careless; after feeling high a person feels down). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_mj_l   == '1' ||   tlfb_mj_c_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_mj_synth_l   == '1' ||   tlfb_mj_synth_c_l   == '1'

meeq_section_q06.Description: Marijuana has bad effects on a person's body and gives people cravings (get the munchies/hungry; have a dry mouth; hard to stop laughing). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_mj_l   == '1' ||   tlfb_mj_c_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_mj_synth_l   == '1' ||   tlfb_mj_synth_c_l   == '1'

sub_res_mj_q01_l.Description: When using marijuana the first time or two, did you: like the taste | 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Some; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = A great deal / tlfb_mj_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_blunt_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_edible_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_mj_conc_use_l  == '1' ||  or  tlfb_mj_drink_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_tincture_use_l  == '1'

sub_res_mj_q02_l.Description: When using marijuana the first time or two, did you: cough | 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Some; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = A great deal / tlfb_mj_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_blunt_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_edible_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_mj_conc_use_l  == '1' || tlfb_mj_drink_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_tincture_use_l  == '1'

sub_res_mj_q04_l.Description: When using marijuana the first time or two, did you: feel more relaxed | 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Some; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = A great deal / tlfb_mj_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_blunt_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_edible_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_mj_conc_use_l  == '1' || tlfb_mj_drink_use_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_tincture_use_l  == '1'

mapi_q01_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: not able to do your homework or study for a test. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q02_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: got into fights, acted bad, or did mean things. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q03_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: missed out on other things because you spent too much money on marijuana. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q04_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: went to work or school high. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q05_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: caused shame or embarrassment to someone. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q06_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: neglected your responsibilities. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q07_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: relatives avoided you. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q08_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: felt that you needed more marijuana than you used to use in order to get the same effect. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q09_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: tried to control your smoking by trying to smoke only at certain times of the day or certain places. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q10_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: had withdrawal symptoms, that is, felt sick because you stopped or cut down on smoking. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q11_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: noticed a change in your personality. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q12_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: felt that you had a problem with marijuana. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q13_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: missed a day (or part of a day) of school or work. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q14_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: suddenly found yourself in a place that you could not remember getting to. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q15_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: passed out or fainted suddenly. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q16_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: kept smoking when you promised yourself not to. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q17_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: felt physically or psychologically dependent on marijuana. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'

mapi_q18_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were smoking marijuana or as the result of your marijuana use: were told by a friend or neighbor to stop or cut down smoking. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+ / xskipout_mj_l   == '1'
